data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Palmeiras a goal kick.
In the minute 5, Willian gets his shot on target but fails to score for Palmeiras.
Palmeiras drives forward and Lucas Lima gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Palmeiras in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Recife PE at Allianz Parque.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ramires (Palmeiras) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 9, Palmeiras drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 11, Recife PE have been awarded a penalty in Sao Paulo...
Iago Maidana nets and Recife PE now lead 0-1. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Palmeiras have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Palmeiras are in shooting range from this free kick.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 17, Diego Pombo Lopez awards the away team a throw-in.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Palmeiras.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, At Allianz Parque, Ronaldo has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Palmeiras push forward at Allianz Parque and Gabriel Menino gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Lima for Palmeiras who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 21, Palmeiras's Lucas Lima is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
Palmeiras push upfield but Diego Pombo Lopez quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Free kick Palmeiras.
Ze Rafael of Palmeiras smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 28, Wesley (Palmeiras) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Goal! Willian levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 31, Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Iago Maidana (Recife PE) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 32, Palmeiras have a goal kick.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Palmeiras.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 34, Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Palmeiras in their own half.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
In the minute 36, Palmeiras are coming forward and Gabriel Menino gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 37, Recife PE attack but Sander's header doesn't find the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 38, Palmeiras's Matias Vina is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Palmeiras.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 42, Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Ze Rafael puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
Wesley instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 44, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Adryelson (Recife PE) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Palmeiras’s Wesley is on his feet again at Allianz Parque.
Diego Pombo Lopez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Willian of Palmeiras is pulled up for offside.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Sao Paulo.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Recife PE are down to 10 men after Sander has been shown a red card.
In the minute 45, Diego Pombo Lopez waits before resuming play because Wesley for Palmeiras is still down.
The away team replace Hernane Brocador with Luciano.
The second-half is underway at Allianz Parque.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 46, Marcao Silva is replacing Ronaldo for Recife PE at Allianz Parque.
Rogerio is on a sub for Leandro Barcia for Recife PE.
The home team have replaced Wesley with Gabriel Veron. This is the first substitution made today by Vanderlei Luxemburgo.
In the minute 46, Palmeiras make their second substitution with Danilo Dos Santos De Oliveira replacing Ramires.
Gabriel Menino of Palmeiras gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Palmeiras are pushing forward but Willian's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Palmeiras in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Recife PE throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Palmeiras in the half of Recife PE.
Gabriel Menino (Palmeiras) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Palmeiras.
In the minute 54, Ze Rafael (Palmeiras) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
In Sao Paulo Recife PE drive forward through Luciano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 56, Recife PE surge into the attack at Allianz Parque but Adryelson’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Palmeiras at Allianz Parque.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Palmeiras close to the penalty box.
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 59, Palmeiras's Ze Rafael has been shown a second yellow card and sent off.
Throw-in Recife PE.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Palmeiras's half?
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Recife PE throw-in in Palmeiras's half.
Free kick Palmeiras.
In the minute 63, Rogerio for Recife PE has been booked by Diego Pombo Lopez and receives a first yellow card.
Lucas Mugni levels the score at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Rogerio.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Palmeiras in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 69, Palmeiras's Gabriel Menino gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In Sao Paulo, Gabriel Menino of Palmeiras is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Palmeiras pushes forward through Mayke, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 71, Can Palmeiras capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
In the minute 72, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a throw-in for Palmeiras, close to Recife PE's area.
Palmeiras make their fourth substitution with Gabriel Silva replacing Lucas Lima.
Bruno Henrique is replacing Mayke for the home team.
Palmeiras awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 76, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Sao Paulo to check on Lucas Mugni, who is grimacing with pain.
Joao Igor (Recife PE) has replaced the possibly injured Lucas Mugni.
Palmeiras drive upfield and Matias Vina gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 78, Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a fifth substitution, with Bruninho replacing Ricardinho.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 79, Palmeiras awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gabriel Menino is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Marcos Rocha (Palmeiras) has replaced the possibly injured Gabriel Menino at Allianz Parque.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Palmeiras.
In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Marquinhos (Recife PE) has been given a yellow card and will be suspended from the next match.
In the minute 83, Gabriel Silva (Palmeiras) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sao Paulo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Diego Pombo Lopez signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in Palmeiras.
Palmeiras to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 87, Diego Pombo Lopez awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Ball safe as Palmeiras is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Palmeiras's Danilo Dos Santos De Oliveira gets in a shot on goal at Allianz Parque. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 89, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Palmeiras.
Vitor Hugo (Palmeiras) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 89, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Recife PE's Bruninho has run offside.
At Allianz Parque the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Diego Pombo Lopez signals a Palmeiras throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Palmeiras attack but Willian's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Allianz Parque.
Palmeiras's Willian breaks free at Allianz Parque. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Palmeiras in Sao Paulo.
Can Palmeiras get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Palmeiras have been awarded a corner by Diego Pombo Lopez.
In Sao Paulo, Willian (Palmeiras) misses the target with a header.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Allianz Parque.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Diego Pombo Lopez blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
